name: IFEval (Audio)
description: Audio-rendered variant of IFEval where models must follow spoken instructions and satisfy programmatic checks.

metrics.name: accuracy
metrics.definition: Fraction of audio prompts producing outputs that pass all verifiable checks

test_method: Use the IFEval verifier on transcripts of speech outputs while providing spoken instructions as inputs.
notes: Ensure consistent ASR pipeline for transcription; IFEval checks are case-sensitive.
